arts.ttl: David Beckham sends touching message to Lionel Messi after Inter Miami's latest triumph
arts.sum: David Beckham's Inter Miami wrapped up more silverware on Wednesday, as two goals from Lionel Messi and one from Luis Suarez saw them win the Supporters' Shield

arts.ttl: Messi after Supporters’ Shield win: “it’s time to think about what comes next”
arts.sum: When asked about Inter Miami’s transformation, Messi said, “ I think Tata’s arrival, along with players like Busquets, Alba, and Suárez, helped set a clear vision: we wanted to be protagonists from the start, to control possession, and challenge our opponents through our style of play. We’re happy to have achieved our first goal, and now it’s time to think about what comes next”.

arts.ttl: Messi nets 2 as Miami clinches Supporters' Shield
arts.sum: Inter Miami have clinched the 2024 Supporters' Shield with a 3-2 victory over the Columbus Crew on Wednesday night at Lower.com Field in Ohio.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi guides Inter Miami to second trophy of MLS club's history as they seal Supporters' Shield in fiery 3-2 win over Columbus Crew
arts.sum: The boots of Lionel Messi produced magic once again as the Argentine bagged two goals to help Inter Miami defeat the Columbus Crew 3-2 - securing the Supporters Shield for the Herons.

arts.ttl: Messi in first Argentina squad since Copa final
arts.sum: Lionel Messi has been called up by Argentina for the October international window for World Cup qualifiers against Venezuela and Bolivia.

arts.ttl: Wednesday's Major League Soccer predictions including Columbus Crew vs. Inter Miami
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Major League Soccer fixtures, including Columbus Crew vs. Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: When is Columbus Crew - Inter Miami? How to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The game between Columbus Crew - Inter Miami will be played on Wednesday October 2, with kick off at 7:45 p.m. ET / 4:45 p.m. PT . What time does Columbus Crew - Inter Miami start?
